Plot: Three radical environmentalists look to execute the protest of their lives: the explosion of a hydroelectric dam.
Title: Night Moves
Actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Dakota Fanning, Peter Sarsgaard, Alia Shawkat
tomatoConsensus: A uniquely character-driven thriller with a finely composed cast and some outstanding direction from Kelly Reichardt, Night Moves bolsters its thought-provoking themes with compelling drama.
